description: Global overview of Gloo Edge Upstream CRs.

targets.expr: sort_desc(sum by (envoy_cluster_name)(rate(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_total{envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream", app="gloo", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", aws_account="$aws_account", region="$region", cluster_id="$cluster"}[1m])))

panels.description: Displays the upstream request times calculated as buckets over 1 minute intervals.  The legend at the bottom left can be used as a guide to understand outliers.

targets.expr: sum(rate(envoy_cluster_external_upstream_rq_time_bucket{ envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", aws_account="$aws_account", region="$region", cluster_id="$cluster"}[1m])) by (le)

panels.title: Request Time Heatmap

panels.description: This chart shows request time quantiles for the upstream in measurements of P99, P95 and P50.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(envoy_cluster_external_upstream_rq_time_bucket{ envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", aws_account="$aws_account", region="$region", cluster_id="$cluster"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(envoy_cluster_external_upstream_rq_time_bucket{ envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", aws_account="$aws_account", region="$region", cluster_id="$cluster"}[1m])) by (le))

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(envoy_cluster_external_upstream_rq_time_bucket{ envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", aws_account="$aws_account", region="$region", cluster_id="$cluster"}[1m])) by (le))

panels.title: Request Time Quantiles

targets.expr: sum(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_active{ envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream", app="gloo", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", aws_account="$aws_account", region="$region", cluster_id="$cluster"})
sort_desc(sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, envoy_cluster_name) (envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_active{account=~"$aws_account", cluster_id=~"$cluster", region=~"$region", envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream"}[1m]))

sort_desc(sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, envoy_cluster_name) (envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_overflow{account=~"$aws_account", cluster_id=~"$cluster", region=~"$region", envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream"}[1m]))

panels.title: Number of currently ejected hosts (outlier detection)

targets.expr: sum(irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_rx_bytes_total{ envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream", app="gloo", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", aws_account="$aws_account", region="$region", cluster_id="$cluster"}[1m]))

sum(irate(envoy_cluster_upstream_cx_tx_bytes_total{ envoy_cluster_name=~"$upstream", app="gloo", kubernetes_namespace="$namespace", aws_account="$aws_account", region="$region", cluster_id="$cluster"}[1m]))

title: All Upstreams
